bibl.title: Letter from Florence M. Read to Kenneth F. Maxcy, December 22, 1923

div1.p: Read is sending Maxcy a copy of Carter's manuscript, "The Epidemiology of Yellow Fever," from a book in the process of being prepared for publication.

div1.head: Letter from Florence M. Read to Kenneth F. Maxcy, December 22, 1923
div1.p:
Your letter of December 18 has been received during the
absence of Doctor Russell in Europe. In response to your request,
I am sending you a mimeographed copy of Doctor Carter's chapter on
the “Epidemiology of Yellow Fever.” You will understand of course
that this is an advance section of the book now in course of prepara-
tion by Doctor Carter, and is therefore not to be published.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, (Signed) Florence M. Read Doctor Kenneth F. Maxcy
Assistant Surgeon U.S.P.H.S.
Montgomery
Alabama
